title: Edge Environment Details
description: Information automatically collected and added to each experience event received by the AEP Edge orchestration service as part of its XDM requenst enhancing feature.

xdm:geo.title: Geo
xdm:geo.description: The geographic location where the experience was delivered based on the IP address from the client request.

xdm:ipV4.title: IPv4
xdm:ipV4.description: The numerical label assigned to a device participating in a computer network that uses the Internet Protocol for communication.

xdm:ipV6.title: IPv6
xdm:ipV6.description: The numerical label assigned to a device participating in a computer network that uses the Internet Protocol for communication.

xdm:userAgent.title: User agent
xdm:userAgent.description: The HTTP user-agent string from the client request.
